mapper.sql: team_number, supplier_employee_name, supplier_employee_pk, money, time, type, confirm_time, status, comment, sum_money, allot_money, related_pk, card_pk, card_account, create_user, update_user, pk, create_time, update_time, limit_time, approve_user, paid_user
mapper.insert:
insert into supplier_paid_detail
team_number,
supplier_employee_name,
supplier_employee_pk,
money,
time,
type,
confirm_time,
status,
comment,
sum_money,
allot_money,
related_pk,
card_pk,
card_account,
create_user,
update_user,
pk,
create_time,
update_time,
limit_time,
approve_user,

mapper.update:
update supplier_paid_detail
team_number = #{team_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_employee_name = #{supplier_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_employee_pk = #{supplier_employee_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_time = #{confirm_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum_money = #{sum_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
allot_money = #{allot_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
related_pk = #{related_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_pk = #{card_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
card_account = #{card_account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_time = #{limit_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_user = #{approve_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paid_user = #{paid_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select A.team_number, B.financial_body_name as supplier_employee_name, B.financial_body_pk as supplier_employee_pk, A.money, A.time AS time, A.type, A.confirm_time, A.status, A.comment, A.sum_money, A.allot_money, A.related_pk, A.card_pk, A.card_account, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.pk, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.limit_time, A.approve_user, A.paid_user, C.user_name AS approve_user_name, D.user_name As paid_user_name from paid_detail A left join supplier_employee B on A.supplier_employee_pk=B.pk LEFT JOIN user_base C ON A.approve_user = C.user_number LEFT JOIN user_base D ON A.paid_user = D.user_number where A.related_pk = #{related_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
